description: HammerTap DeepAnalysis, which was renamed to just HammerTap, was an eBay market research tool that sellers used to gather and analyze sales activity for various items and categories of items. After using DeepAnalysis to retrieve data, sellers could save that data as a DA2 file, so they could load and review the data again in the future.

common_filenames.description: [name of the game].da2 - The DA2 file possesses the same name as the game it's created for.
